title: How Many Calories in 3 Strawberries?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 3 strawberries, including carbs, fiber, vitamins, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for your diet.
assumptions: Medium-sized fresh strawberries (~12 g each), whole, raw, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged berries when available.

quick_answer.text: Three medium strawberries provide about 12 kcal, mostly from natural sugars, with high vitamin C content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use large strawberries instead ( ~18 g each)

faqs.q: How many calories in one strawberry?
faqs.a: About 4 kcal for a medium-sized fresh strawberry.
Yes, 3 strawberries have ~2.7 g carbs, with 0.6 g fiber.

faqs.q: What nutrients besides calories in 3 strawberries?
faqs.a: High in vitamin C (~25 mg), antioxidants, and low in fat/protein.
Natural sugars: ~1.8 g in 3 medium strawberries.

faqs.q: How does strawberry size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger ones add ~2 kcal each; smaller ones less. Weigh for precision.
